member.name: F:SocketMeister.Constants.SEND_RECEIVE_BUFFER_SIZE
member.summary: The buffer size to use for sending and receiving data. Note: This value is also used by the 'SocketServer' class.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Constants.SEND_RESPONSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
member.summary: Number of seconds to wait before generating a timeout error when sending a response to a request.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Constants.SocketAsyncEventArgsPoolSize
member.summary: The number of simultaneous send operations which can take place. Value should be between 2 and 20

member.name: T:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine
member.summary: This is the core engine for creating bytes to send down a socket and to receive bytes from a socket.
This is the core engine for creating bytes to send down a socket and to receive bytes from a socket.

member.name: T:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2
member.summary: Improved C# LZF Compressor, a very small data compression library. The compression algorithm is extremely fast.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.BUFFER_SIZE_ESTIMATE
member.summary: Multiple of input size used to estimate work/output buffer size. Larger values increase initial memory usage but potentially reduces number of allocations.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.HLOG
member.summary: Size of hashtable is 2^HLOG bytes. Decompression is independent of the hash table size. The difference between 15 and 14 is very small for small blocks (and 14 is usually a bit faster). For a low-memory/faster configuration, use HLOG == 13; For best compression, use 15 or 16 (or more, up to 22).

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.HashTable
member.summary: Hashtable, that can be allocated only once.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.locker
member.summary: Lock object for access to hashtable so that we can keep things thread safe. Still up to the caller to make sure any shared outputBuffer use is thread safe.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.Compress(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Compress input bytes.
member.param: Bytes to compress.

member.summary: Compress input bytes.
member.param: Bytes to compress.
Length of data in inputBytes to decompress.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.Compress(System.Byte[],System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Compress input bytes.
member.param: Bytes to compress.
Output/work buffer. Upon completion, will contain the output.

member.summary: Compress input bytes.

member.summary: Compresses the data using LibLZF algorithm.

Reference to a buffer which will contain the compressed data.
Length of input bytes to process.
member.returns: The size of the compressed archive in the output buffer.

member.name: T:SocketMeister.Messages.PollRequest
member.summary: Internal Message: Socket client regulary sends a poll request to the server to check that the server is alive.

member.name: T:SocketMeister.Messages.PollResponse
member.summary: Internal Message: Socket server sends a response to a 'PollRequest' message to indicate (to the client) that the server is alive.

member.summary: A request, sent from socket client to socket server. A response is expected and will cause problems if it is not sent.

member.summary: The remote client which sent this RequestMessage (value null on SocketClient)

The maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a response before timing out.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.Messages.RequestMessage.Parameters
member.summary: Parameters provided with this request

member.name: P:SocketMeister.Messages.RequestMessage.IsLongPolling
member.summary: True is this request is long polling on the server side. Long polling requests will be closed immediately in the event of a close from either the client or server side.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.Messages.RequestMessage.IsTimeout
member.summary: Whether the RequestMessage has timed out

member.name: P:SocketMeister.Messages.RequestMessage.RequestId
member.summary: Identifier assigned to this request when it was created (usually when created at the client)

member.name: P:SocketMeister.Messages.RequestMessage.TimeoutMilliseconds
member.summary: Number of milliseconds to wait before a timeout will occur.

member.summary: Whether the method SendReceive(RequestMessage Request) should continute trying

member.name: P:SocketMeister.Messages.RequestMessage.WaitForResponse

member.name: P:SocketMeister.Messages.ServerStoppingMessage.MaxWaitMilliseconds
member.summary: The maximum number of milliseconds the client should wait for open requests to be completed. The server will not send back responses for open requests after this time.

member.name: T:SocketMeister.OpenRequestMessageCollection
member.summary: Threadsafe list of open request messages, which we are waiting for a response.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.OpenRequestMessageCollection.Count
member.summary: Number of open items.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.OpenRequestMessageCollection.ResetToUnsent
member.summary: Resets all messages which do not have a response, to 'Unsent'. The locks on all items are released so unsent items can be resent when a connection is reestablished.

member.summary: The parameters provided with the message.

member.summary: Values provided when a request is received from a server.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.SocketClient.RequestReceivedEventArgs.Response
member.summary: The byte array which is to be returned to the client. Null is returned if a 'Response' value is not provided when processing the 'RequestReceived' event.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.SocketClient.DISCONNECT_AFTER_NO_POLL_RESPONSE_SECONDS
member.summary: If a poll response has not been received from the server after a number of seconds, the socketet client will be disconnected.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.SocketClient.DONT_RECONNECT_DELAY_AFTER_SHUTDOWN
member.summary: When a shutdown occurs, particularly because of network failure or server shutdown, delay attempting to reconnect to that server, giving the server some time to complete it's shutdown process.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.SocketClient.POLLING_FREQUENCY
member.summary: The frequency, in seconds, that this client will poll the server, to ensure the socket is alive.

member.summary: Event raised when a status of a socket connection has changed

member.summary: Event raised whenever a message is received from the server.

member.name: E:SocketMeister.SocketClient.RequestReceived
member.summary: Raised when a request message is received from the server. A response can be provided which will be returned to the server.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.SocketClient.SendRequest(System.Object[],System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Send a request to the server and wait for a response.
member.param: Array of parameters to send with the request
Maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a response from the server
If the request is long polling on the server mark this as true and the request will be cancelled instantly when a disconnect occurs
member.returns: Nullable array of bytes which was returned from the socket server

member.name: M:SocketMeister.SocketClient.ProcessReceive(System.Object,System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs)
member.summary: A block of data has been received through the socket. It may contain part of a message, a message, or multiple messages. Process the incoming bytes and when a full message has been received, process the complete message.
member.param: Sending Socket
Socket Arguments

member.name: T:SocketMeister.PolicyServer
member.summary: Lightweight TCP server which listens on port 943 for policy file requests from Silverlight clients. Policy file describes which ports between 4502-4534 can be used by Silverlight.

member.name: T:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.PolicyRequestReceivedEventArgs
member.summary: Raised whenever a policy request is received

member.name: P:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.PolicyRequestReceivedEventArgs.EndPoint
member.summary: The end point (client) requesting the policy file

member.name: F:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.ServicePort
member.summary: TCP port that the policy service listens on

member.name: E:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.TraceEventRaised
member.summary: Trace message raised from within SocketMeister.

member.name: E:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.PolicyRequestReceived
member.summary: A request for the policy file was received.

member.name: E:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.ListenerStateChanged
member.summary: The status of the socket server changed. Statuses include stating, started, stopping and stopped.

member.name: E:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.UnknownRequestReceived
member.summary: An unknown request was received. Port 943 is expecting ONLY policy requests.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.#ctor
member.summary: PolicyServer Constructor. The policy server will connect to all network interfaces on port 943

member.name: P:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.IPAddress
member.summary: The IP address being used.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.ListenerState
member.summary: The current status of the listener socket. Statuses include Stopped, Starting, Started and Stopping

member.name: M:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.Start
member.summary: Start the socket server. This is a background operation. Your code can (optionally) poll the 'SocketServer.SocketServerStatus' property or catch the 'SocketServer.SocketServerStatusChanged' Event.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.PolicyServer.Stop
member.summary: Stop the socket server. This is a background operation. Your code can (optionally) poll the 'SocketServer.SocketServerStatus' property or catch the 'SocketServer.SocketServerStatusChanged' Event.

member.name: T:SocketMeister.SocketServer
member.summary: TCP/IP socket server which listens for client connections and raises events when messages are received

member.name: T:SocketMeister.SocketServer.Client
member.summary: Remote client which has connected to the socket server

member.summary: Unique GUID assigned to each client

member.name: P:SocketMeister.SocketServer.Client.ClientSocket
member.summary: Socket which the client is transmitting data on.

member.summary: Date and time which the client connected.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.SocketServer.Client.ReceiveBuffer
member.summary: Byte array to directly receive data from the socket.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.SocketServer.Client.ReceiveEnvelope
member.summary: Class which processes raw data directly from the socket and converts into usable messages.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.SocketServer.Client.SendMessage(System.Object[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Send a message to this client
member.param: Parameters to send to the client.
Number of milliseconds to attempt to send the message before throwing a TimeoutException.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.SocketServer.Client.SendRequest(System.Object[],System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Send a request to the server and wait for a response.
member.param: Array of parameters to send with the request
Maximum number of milliseconds to wait for a response from the server
If the request is long polling on the server mark this as true and the request will be cancelled instantly when a disconnect occurs
member.returns: Nullable array of bytes which was returned from the socket server

member.name: E:SocketMeister.SocketServer.Clients.ClientDisconnected
